verbs.description: NEW YORK ( AP ) — [ARG1: Lawyers for President Donald Trump] [V: will] be [ARG2: back] in court Thursday as part of his attempt to limit investigators’ access to records the FBI seized from his personal lawyer , Michael Cohen . …
